product_name: The North Face Denali Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made with midweight TKA 300 fleece and abrasion-resistant knuckle and finger panels, the North Face Denali Gloves for women offer your hands plush warmth for cold-weather adventures. Warm, breathable fleece dries quickly, insulates even when wet and is easy to care for. Taslan(R) nylon inserts across the knuckles add durability. Polyurethane pads on the fingertips and across the palms improve grip. The North Face Denali Gloves are cut to follow the natural curve of the hand, reducing bulk and improving dexterity. Closeout.
short_description: Made with midweight TKA 300 fleece and abrasion-resistant knuckle and finger panels, the North Face Denali Gloves for women offer your hands plush warmth for cold-weather adventures.
